definition: زفر zafara i (zafr, زفير zafīr) to sigh deeply, heave deep sighs; to pant, groan, moan; 378 to blow off, exhaust, puff out (هـ air, breath) زفر II to soil with grease begrime (هـ s.th.) زفر zafar grease, greasy food │ثلاثاء الزفر talātā’ az-z. Mardi Gras, Shrove Tuesday (Chr.) زفر zafir greasy; grimy; unclean, dirty, filthy; stinking, rancid, rank
